title: If the area under DP reservation to be handed over to MCGM(excluding the areas under DP roads/ road setback) is less than the required area of amenity as per this Regulation, only the additional land area shall be provided for amenity
clause_text: If the area under DP reservation to be handed over to MCGM(excluding the areas under DP roads/ road setback) is less than the required area of amenity as per this Regulation, only the additional land area shall be provided for amenity .
section: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential or Commercial Zone for the Uses permissible in Residential or Commercial Zone
